summary: This is an email chain forwarding a draft Rule 404(b) notice letter regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case, involving prosecutors from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. It shows internal coordination on legal strategy ahead of a court deadline.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is a Rule 404(b) notice letter related to her criminal case, indicating she is the subject of the legal proceeding.

events.title: Deadline for Rule 404(b) notice
events.description: A draft Rule 404(b) notice letter regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case is being reviewed, with the final version due to be submitted.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain among prosecutors regarding a Rule 404(b) notice in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The draft notice was due on Monday, October 11, 2021, indicating active legal proceedings at that time.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, showing federal prosecution involvement.
